page.title: 09COMMUNICATION in RHAYADER
page.content: The{Branch Library}regularly exhibits old photographs and memorabilia.It is open each weekday and 3 evenings. The {Post Office}was demoted from Crown Status some years ago and is now a privately owned sub office.Post is collected and delivered daily. Both the Library and Post Office are used by local groups to advertise forth- coming attractions. The{Tourist Office provides visitors with information about the area.The{Museum}was opened in 1980 and various relics including early photographs of the town. Several{buses}pass through taking passengers to nearby towns.A{Post Bus operates daily carrying both mail and passengers. There are 4 local{papers}(not printed in the town):Radnor Express,Brecon and Radnor Express,County Times,Mid-Wales Journal.
